snippet: Ingredients in restaurant food are generally far superior to what they were 10 years ago, a critic finds.
abstract: Eric Asimov Critic's Notebook on the pleasure of returning to analytic eating as interim restaurant critic after seven years and finding that ingredients in restaurant food are generally far superior to what they were 10 years ago.
lead_paragraph: Ingredients in restaurant food are generally far superior to what they were 10 years ago, a critic finds.

headline.seo: Eric Asimov Reflects on His Brief Stint as Interim Restaurant Critic
headline.main: Eric Asimov: How the View from the Critic’s Perch Has Changed
headline.print_headline: The Changing View, Seven Years Out
